step.name: Given landing on automation pratices page

step.title: Then landing on 'AUTHENTICATION' page

step.title: When provide email id click on create an account

step.title: Then landing on 'CREATE AN ACCOUNT' page

step.title: When fill personal infromation click register

step.title: When click on Women element from header menu

step.title: Then should get pop-up Product successfully added to your shopping cart

step.title: When click the Proceed to checkout botton of SHOPPING-CART SUMMARY

step.title: When click the Proceed to checkout botton of Address Page

step.title: And click the Proceed to checkout boutton of Shopping page

step.name: Then should be navigated to 'PLEASE CHOOSE YOUR PAYMENT METHOD' Page
step.title: Then should be navigated to 'PLEASE CHOOSE YOUR PAYMENT METHOD' Page

step.title: When select any one Payment method from display and click
